hanzi-su-wiki:
舶

Значения

Судно, корабль

Мнемоника

Окрашенное белой 白 краской судно 舟, морской лайнер. Ранее вместо «белый» писали «сто» 百 — на такое судно помещается не менее ста пассажиров.
purpleculture_pinyin:
bó
ship
корабль
rtega_mnemonic:
舶舶RSlarge, ocean-going vessel, liner
  • boat 舟 seeing white 白 waves at sea: large ocean-going vessel
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 白 indicates the sound; 舟 (ship) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
船舶 [ chuán bó ]: shipping; boats
舶来品 [ bó lái pǐn ]: (old) imported goods; foreign goods
中国船舶工业集团 [ zhōng guó chuán bó gōng yè jí tuán ]: China State Shipbuilding Corporation (CSSC)
中国船舶贸易公司 [ zhōng guó chuán bó mào yì gōng sī ]: China Shipbuilding Trading Corporation (CSTC)
中国船舶重工集团公司 [ zhōng guó chuán bó zhòng gōng jí tuán gōng sī ]: China Ship Scientific Research Center (CSSRC)
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 舟 [ zhōu ] boat, ship
    • 白 [ bái ] white; clear, pure, unblemished; bright
heisig_chinese_memo: The most famous boat is the Titanic, which struck an iceberg and sunk. Just imagine that huge LINER striking an even huger mass of white ice.
heisig_story: The type of boat connoted by this key word is a large oceangoing liner. The important thing here is to work with the elements boat and dove to make an image distinct from that of the former frame. Don't count on size alone to distinguish the boat from the liner.
koohiiStory1: The most famous LINER is the Titanic, which struck an iceberg and sunk. Just imagine that huge LINER strucking an even huger mass of white ice.
koohiiStory2: A liner is to boat as an emperor (#261) is to a king (#255), or a chief (#967) is to a person (#951): in each case we need only add white to the latter in order to get the former.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A boat that's white isn't just a boat, it's a ship.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Boats don't need to be a bright white color. But, ships do! They're dangerous and big, so they paint them nice and white.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: A white-painted ship is a kind of hack (はく). It makes the ship more visible without costing much.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: You can also imagine hacking the ship's computer. "Look at me, look at me. You are the hacker now."
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the white (白) boat (舟) is a ship
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The most famous boat is the Titanic, which struck an iceberg and sunk. Just imagine that huge LINER striking an even huger mass of white ice.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " boat " to " white " sound. The original meaning is a big ship. "Guang Yun. "Mo Yun": "Ship, the big ship in the sea." And "The Sound and Meaning of All Classics" Volume Twenty Hanging "Pi Cang": "Ship, a big boat, 20 feet long, carrying six or seven hundred people." Such as " Shan Hai Jing. "Jiangshui": "The former grandson Quan installed a big ship, the name is Chang'an, also known as the Big Ship, and it carried 3,000 people sitting upright, and boating Jiangjin with the officials." Volume Three: "Sima wrong rate Ba, 100,000 people in Shu, Dabo 10,000 ships, 6 million hu in Dendrobium, floating rivers against Chu, Qianzhong County is the place where the merchants are taken."

" Ship " also means sea-going ship. "Ji Yun. "Mo Yun": "The barbarians are sailing boats called ships." For example, Han Yu of the Tang Dynasty "Zuo Cheng Kong's Epitaph of Zhengyi Doctor Shangshu Zuo Cheng Kong": "The most berth of the Fan Ship, there is a tax on the lower fortress." "Old Tang Book. "Li Mian Chuan": "Fore and after the Western Regions ships across the sea until the age is only four or five years old, reluctantly and clean, and imports are not reviewed, so the last year is more than forty." Another example is "imported goods", which means foreign goods brought by sea ships. .
humanum_short_description_en: From the " boat " to the " white " sound. The original meaning is a big ship.
humanum_full_description:
從「舟」，「白」聲。本義是大船。《廣韻．陌韻》：「舶，海中大船也。」又《一切經音義》卷二十弔《埤蒼》：「舶，大舩也，長二十丈，載六七百人是也。」如《山海經．江水》：「昔孫權裝大船，名之曰長安，亦曰大舶，載坐直之士三千人，與群臣泛舟江津。」《華陽國志．卷三》：「司馬錯率巴、蜀眾十萬，大舶舩萬艘，米六百萬斛，浮江伐楚，取商於之地為黔中郡。」

　　「舶」也表示海船。《集韻．陌韻》：「蠻夷泛海舟曰舶。」如唐代韓愈〈正議大夫尚書左丞孔公墓誌銘〉：「蕃舶之至泊步，有下碇之稅。」《舊唐書．李勉傳》：「前後西域舶泛海至者歲纔四五，勉性廉潔，舶來都不檢閱，故末年至者四十餘。」又如「舶來品」，意謂海船帶來的外國貨品。

船舶(せんぱく): ship

從「 舟 」，「 白 」聲。本義是大船。《廣韻．陌韻》：「舶，海中大船也。」又《一切經音義》卷二十弔《埤蒼》：「舶，大舩也，長二十丈，載六七百人是也。」如《山海經．江水》：「昔孫權裝大船，名之曰長安，亦曰大舶，載坐直之士三千人，與群臣泛舟江津。」《華陽國志．卷三》：「司馬錯率巴、蜀眾十萬，大舶舩萬艘，米六百萬斛，浮江伐楚，取商於之地為黔中郡。」 「 舶 」也表示海船。《集韻．陌韻》：「蠻夷泛海舟曰舶。」如唐代韓愈〈正議大夫尚書左丞孔公墓誌銘〉：「蕃舶之至泊步，有下碇之稅。」《舊唐書．李勉傳》：「前後西域舶泛海至者歲纔四五，勉性廉潔，舶來都不檢閱，故末年至者四十餘。」又如「舶來品」，意謂海船帶來的外國貨品。
From " boat" to " white" sound. The original meaning is a big ship. "Guang Yun. "Mo Yun": "Ship, the big ship in the sea." And "The Sound and Meaning of All Classics" Volume Twenty Hanging "Pi Cang": "Ship, a big boat, 20 feet long, carrying six or seven hundred people." Such as " Shan Hai Jing. "Jiangshui": "The former grandson Quan installed a big ship, the name is Chang'an, also known as the Big Ship, and it carried 3,000 people sitting upright, and boating Jiangjin with the officials." Volume Three: "Sima wrong rate Ba, 100,000 people in Shu, Dabo 10,000 ships, 6 million hu in Dendrobium, floating rivers against Chu, Qianzhong County is the place where the merchants are taken." " Ship" also means sea-going ship. "Ji Yun. "Mo Yun": "The barbarians are sailing boats called ships." For example, Han Yu of the Tang Dynasty "Zuo Cheng Kong's Epitaph of Zhengyi Doctor Shangshu Zuo Cheng Kong": "The most berth of the Fan Ship, there is a tax on the lower fortress." "Old Tang Book. "Li Mian Chuan": "Fore and after the Western Regions ships across the sea until the age is only four or five years old, reluctantly and clean, and imports are not reviewed, so the last year is more than forty." Another example is "imported goods", which means foreign goods brought by sea ships. .

舶字的基本解释

舶
bó
航海的大船：船舶（对船的通称）。巨舶。海舶。舶来品（指外国输入的货物）。

［《廣韻》傍陌切，入陌，並。］
亦作“艊1”。
航海的大船。

ship

舶字的康熙字典解释

【未集下】【舟字部】　舶； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页1010第12
【廣韻】傍伯切【集韻】【韻會】簿陌切，?音白。【廣韻】海中大船。【集韻】蠻夷汎海舟曰舶。【通俗文】晉曰舶。【集韻】或作艊。　又【韻補】叶簿覓切，音逼。【歐陽修·白鸚鵡詩】其閒注輦來最稀，此鳥何年隨海舶。誰能遍歷海上峰，萬怪千奇安可極。

舶字的源字形

舶字的起名意思

意指大船，海船。

Name meaning
Means big ship, sea ship.
舶
形声字。舟表意,其古文字形体像一条船;白(bdi )表声,白有显扬、光彩义,表示舶作为航海的大船比一般的船显眼气
派。本义是大船。
航海的大船:船~|巨~|海~。
~来品 船~海~ 巨~
bó
舶|舶
楷
корабль
Пиктофонетические символы.
Значение лодки состоит в том, что ее древние символы напоминают лодку; белый цвет (bdi) выражает звук, а белый цвет имеет выдающееся и славное значение, что означает, что корабль более заметен, чем обычные корабли, как парусное судно.
Первоначальное значение - большой корабль.
Большой парусник: корабль ~ | гигант ~ | море ~.
~ приближающаяся лодка ~ море ~ огромная ~
Корабль
Кай
bó
сущ. судно; корабль
舶船 морская джонка
Radicals: 舟, 白  (boat, white)
Meaning Mnemonic
A boat that's white isn't just a boat, it's a ship.
Boats don't need to be a bright white color. But, ships do! They're dangerous and big, so they paint them nice and white.
Reading Mnemonic
A white-painted ship is a kind of hack (はく). It makes the ship more visible without costing much.
You can also imagine hacking the ship's computer. "Look at me, look at me. You are the hacker now."
